section.title: Features That Set Us Apart
section.subtitle: Why Choose we.trsfrm
section.paragraph: Ditch the cookie-cutter websites. we.trsfrm offers personalized, AI-powered solutions that make your business stand out.

featuresData.title: Personalized Content
featuresData.description: Fill out our questionnaire, and watch as AI crafts copy that speaks your brand's language.

featuresData.title: Lightning-Fast Deployment
featuresData.description: From questionnaire to live website in minutes. No coding required.

featuresData.title: Full Customization Control
featuresData.description: Tweak every element to your heart's content. Your site, your rules.

about.title: Leveraging AI to Trsfrm Small Business Web Presence
about.description: we.trsfrm is on a mission to democratize stunning web design. We're not just another website builder – we're your AI-powered partner in crafting a unique online identity that converts visitors into customers.

experience.title: Year of Innovation
experience.description: Pushing the boundaries of AI-driven web design since 2023

callToAction.description: Join the AI revolution in web design. Stand out, convert more, and grow your business with we.trsfrm.

pricing.subtitle: Flexible Plans
pricing.title: Choose Your Trsfrm Package
pricing.paragraph: Affordable solutions for businesses of all sizes. No hidden fees, just pure value.

testimonial.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonial.subtitle: Success Stories
testimonial.paragraph: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what businesses like yours have achieved with we.trsfrm.

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.content: I generated 10 sales within two days of launching my we.trsfrm website. The personalization options really helped me connect with my audience.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Got Questions?
sectionTitle.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sectionTitle.paragraph: Everything you need to know about we.trsfrm and our AI-powered web solutions.

faq.question: How does we.trsfrm's AI generate personalized content?
faq.answer: Our AI analyzes your questionnaire responses and uses advanced language models to create tailored content that reflects your brand voice and business goals.

faq.question: Can I edit the AI-generated content?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You have full control over all content. Our AI provides a starting point, but you can customize everything to your liking.

faq.question: How long does it take to create a website with we.trsfrm?
faq.answer: Most users can have a fully functional website up and running in less than an hour, from questionnaire to deployment.

faq.question: Do I need coding skills to use we.trsfrm?
faq.answer: Not at all! Our platform is designed for non-tech users. If you can fill out a form, you can create a website with we.trsfrm.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Meet the Innovators
sectionTitle.title: The we.trsfrm Team
sectionTitle.paragraph: A group of AI enthusiasts and web design experts on a mission to revolutionize online presence for small businesses.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Get in Touch
sectionTitle.title: We're Here to Help
sectionTitle.paragraph: Have questions or need assistance? Our team is ready to trsfrm your web experience.
